title: Nursing Practice Competency Enhancement: Evidence-Based Learning (EBL) Design for Medical Education Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Terminology Comprehension and Organizational Management Experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design standardized educational processes with 80% accuracy using an evidence-based learning (EBL) design algorithm.
Participants can visually represent relationships between core elements of medical education and learning environments through concept mapping.
Educational administrators can propose at least three competency-awareness improvement strategies to enhance learners’ intrinsic motivation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
